name: Diamond City
description: i made a game half a year back, a short-lived multiplayer racing game that saw you at top speeds on foot, not on wheels. this is that game, all its code and assets, as a primarily singleplayer game that see's you in a small open world city where you can take in the blocky, 'retro' sights and complete delivery missions from one side of the city to the other. do note that 90% of this description is bullshit and barely any of this is *actually* in the game as of currently, but, still, give it a try !
